匞字的基本解释

匞
jiàng
古同“匠”。

匞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàng］
［《廣韻》疾亮切，去漾，從。］
亦作“匞1”。
(1)木工。亦泛指工匠。
(2)制作；创造。
(3)治理。
(4)培养造就。
(5)谓着意经营，使之适合某种标准。
(6)指在某一方面造诣高深的人。
(7)教。

匞字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【匚字部】　匞； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页153第17
【精薀】匠本字。聖人?物，愚者與能。从工从匚，出于規矩準繩，象方正之意。匞譌爲工之重文，別作匠。工之致用，所重不在斤也。

匞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
匞字的起名意思

暂无。

Stubborn
Basic explanation of words
Stubborn
jiàng
Gu Tong "craftsman".
Stubborn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiàng］
["Guangyun" cut brightly, go to Yang, follow. ]
Also known as "匞1".
(1) Woodworking. Also refers to craftsmen in general.
(2) Production; creation.
(3) Governance.
(4) Cultivation.
(5) It means to operate deliberately to make it fit a certain standard.
(6) Refers to a person who is highly accomplished in a certain aspect.
(7) Teaching.
Stubborn
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [匚字部] 　匞; Kangxi strokes: 5; Page number: page 153-17
【精薀】The original character of craftsman. Saints, things, fools and power. Cong Gong Cong 匚, out of the rules of the rules, like the meaning of Founder. Do not be a craftsman. The work is applied, the weight is not in the weight.
